official_title: A resolution designating January 29, 1976, as Chattanooga Area Manufacturers Day.

summary.text: Declares that the House of Representatives proclaims Tuesday, January 29, 1976, as "Chattanooga Area Manufacturers Day."

titles.title: A resolution designating January 29, 1976, as Chattanooga Area Manufacturers Day.
